snippet.title: New Gundam Breaker - PS4/PC -  Snatchaway (Teaser Trailer)
snippet.description:
New Gundam Breaker will be available on 22nd of June 2018 on PS4 and for the first time on PC Digital (Release date to be revealed later on Summer 2018)!
Enjoy the new trailer featuring Snatchaway by SKY-HI band, a perfectly fitting song for this game don’t you think?

Like us: https://www.facebook.com/bandainamcoeu
Follow us: https://twitter.com/Bandainamcoeu
Visit us: https://www.bandainamcoent.eu
